contract_details.description: Comprehensive code deduplication mission focusing on identifying and eliminating duplicate code patterns, refactoring repeated logic into reusable functions, and improving overall code maintainability.
contract_details.background: Agent-3 specializes in code quality and refactoring. This contract addresses the critical need for code deduplication to reduce maintenance overhead and improve code consistency.
objectives: Identify and catalog duplicate code patterns across all modules
Refactor duplicate logic into reusable functions and classes
Eliminate copy-paste code segments with proper abstractions
Create shared utility functions for common operations
Document refactored code with clear usage examples
Validate no functionality regressions from refactoring
deliverables: Shared utility library for common functions
Consistent error handling and logging patterns
success_criteria: Code duplication reduced by >60% across all modules
Shared utility functions created for common patterns
Consistent error handling implemented across codebase
Comprehensive documentation provided for refactored code

dependencies: Codebase analysis completed for duplication patterns
resources_required: Code analysis and duplication detection tools
Code quality metrics and analysis tools

network_unlocks: Access to Code Quality Working Group

contract_history.details: Created code deduplication and refactoring contract for Agent-3 (High Priority)
